title: Verify GitHub skill progressive disclosure works correctly
description: Test that the rebuilt GitHub skill correctly loads only needed content and Claude executes (not just reads) the instructions.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Fresh Claude session: /github shows router, not full docs
Ask 'create an issue' - Claude loads issues.md and executes gh command
Ask 'commit my changes' - Claude loads commits.md and runs smart-commit.sh
Ask 'check auth' - Claude runs gh auth status directly
Trigger GITHUB_TOKEN error - Claude loads troubleshooting.md and follows fix steps
Context usage: verify skill loads <500 tokens for simple operations
